name: Glass Cleaner 2077
description:
The life of a barback ain't easy. 

An endless supply of glasses, cups and mugs are coming your way and waiting to be cleaned, while you desperately try to pay attention to whatever bullshit the customer is spouting. 

Try to avoid a mental breakdown in this heart-pumping, exciting, mind-numbing, glass-cleaning adventure. 

Are you man enough to clean all 3657 pieces of glassware?

Just another day in a bar without end

                            VA-11 HALL-A

Game Jam Game for Ludum Dare 47

CONTROLS:
Z, X, C, V to submerge the glass into a container
SPACE to put the clean glass away
ESCAPE to pause

Direction/Writing: PeronJames

Programming: 730

Art: Player_Unk70nown08 (MHG)

Original Song (Waiting for the Night): Denki

Special Thanks: Kooh, Bagingi123, Sukeban Games

SETLIST - セットリスト:
-Midnight Etoile - Michie Tomizawa
-Midnight Rendezvous - Casiopea (1979 version)
-HALCALISM Candy Hearts - HALCALI
-Explorer - T-Square
-Waiting for the Night - Denki
